columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the application insight.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains id to identify the application insight uniquely.

columns.name: app_id
columns.description: Application insights unique id for your Application.

columns.name: connection_string
columns.description: Application Insights component connection string.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: Creation date for the Application Insights component.

columns.name: disable_ip_masking
columns.description: Disable IP masking.

columns.name: disable_local_auth
columns.description: Disable Non-AAD based Auth.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: force_customer_storage_for_profiler
columns.description: Force users to create their own storage account for profiler and debugger.

columns.name: immediate_purge_data_on_30_days
columns.description: Purge data immediately after 30 days.

columns.name: instrumentation_key
columns.description: Application Insights Instrumentation key.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The kind of application that this component refers to, used to customize UI.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Current state of this component.

columns.name: request_source
columns.description: Describes what tool created this Application Insights component.

columns.name: retention_in_days
columns.description: Retention period in days.

columns.name: sampling_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of the data produced by the application being monitored that is being sampled for Application Insights telemetry.

columns.name: tenant_id
columns.description: Azure Tenant ID.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the application insight.

columns.name: workspace_resource_id
columns.description: Resource Id of the log analytics workspace to which the data will be ingested.

columns.name: application_type
columns.description: Type of application being monitored.

columns.name: flow_type
columns.description: Determines what kind of flow this component was created by.

columns.name: ingestion_mode
columns.description: Indicates the flow of the ingestion.

columns.name: private_link_scoped_resources
columns.description: List of linked private link scope resources.

columns.name: public_network_access_for_ingestion
columns.description: The network access type for accessing Application Insights ingestion.

columns.name: public_network_access_for_query
columns.description: The network access type for accessing Application Insights query.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
